channel.title: How does max hit get calculated

item.title: How does max hit get calculated
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

Looking at the code below i understand i is something like :

Strbonus + Strenght / 6.8275862068965517241379310344828
But that wont give a accurate calculation like it in in runescape

The double does something but i cant figure out what

[code] public void CalculateMaxHit() {

    double MaxHit = 0;
    int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; 
    int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; 

        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.8275862068965517241379310344828));[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How does max hit get calculated
